name: lanai
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a raised, covered, sometimes partly closed area, often made of wood, on the front or side of a building: During the algae blooms, they can't eat on their lanai or open the windows of their home. The storm left tree limbs littering the streets and porches and lanais crumpled. Synonyms
porch
veranda
More examplesFewer examplesI was standing out on the lanai and heard a sound like a train coming.The condo owners association recently banned smoking on lanais.The second- floor lanai overlooks a hidden tropical courtyard.
